title: Buddy Finds a Home
description: Buddy was rescued from the streets and found a loving family. His transformation is inspiring!
content: Buddy was found malnourished and scared. After months of care and love, he's now a happy, healthy dog with a forever home.
author: Admin User

title: Community Comes Together
description: How our community saved 50 animals in one month
content: Through collective effort, we rescued and rehomed 50 animals. This shows the power of community action.
author: Admin User
